pages.md:
# Features Accessible via Connection Settings

## Features that can be accessed if set by CREATE/EDIT CONNECTION SETTING

| Feature                | Description                                                                 |
|------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Tethered photography   | Take pictures from a computer to which the camera is connected ("tethered") via wireless or wired LAN. |
| Upload to FTP servers  | Upload files to FTP servers.                                                |
| Remote movie recording | Control the camera and take pictures remotely using a web browser on a computer or tablet. |

These features can be accessed by selecting a connection setting profile to which the desired settings and connection type have been saved using CREATE/EDIT CONNECTION SETTING.

## Features that can be accessed if set by the network/USB setting menu

| Feature            | Description                  |
|--------------------|------------------------------|
| Upload to Frame.io | Upload files to Frame.io.    |

These features can be accessed if set by the network/USB setting menu.
